creator: marcus@fysix.com
text:
We have some customazations in mod_proxy that make use
of request->notes. After upgrading to apache 1.3.27
those no longer worked. Eventually I found it's due to
the request->notes to be "lost" somewhere. Also I could not
find the problem to be in the mod_proxy code. It seems it
might be a core problem. On the mod_perl mailing list
I also found other people with that problem.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
Certainly it's not a bug in Apache. Nothing has been changed in handling of
r->notes.

If you still think, it's a bug, feel free to reopen the report and write more
specific, what you did, what you did expect and what happened finally.

Thanks for using Apache.
